Package de.oth.blocklib.materials

Class SpriteSheetMaterial

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.materials.Material
de.oth.blocklib.materials.BaseMaterial
de.oth.blocklib.materials.SpriteSheetMaterial
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SpriteSheetMaterial
extends BaseMaterial
Material for all objects using sprite sheet animations. The used texture is treated as a grid of animation frames.
Author:
Tobias Werner SS18
